detectors.description:
xDeFiToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/xDeFiToken.sol#99-104) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/xDeFiToken.sol#101)
